name: Valentines: 2 Short VNs in 1 File
description:
Hello Everyone! This is my first game I've made. It's actually 2 games in one uwu It was a game made in a week so the art isn't spectacular and some sprites are weird so I might update with better art sometime.

Anyway, this game is a dating sim! It's set in high school with 2 routes: one female and one male. One about comforting and the other is horror-esk. Both with multiple endings! It features 2p!Belgium and 2p!Hong Kong which are Hetalia-based characters but don't worry! You don't even have to know what Hetalia is to play! Anyone is welcome and each story is built so no matter who you are, you'll enjoy playing it.  (Beta testers enjoyed it, both Hetalians and non Hetalians)

Please let me know if there is any bugs or spelling errors! I'm also open to any and all feedback!

My contacts are:

Email: commissionsfromcupcake@gmail.com

Twitter: https://twitter.com/LdyCupcakeCmshn

and Tumblr: https://www.tumblr.com/blog/ladycupcakecommissions

Thanks for checking this out, even if you don't download! Have a nice day and a fun time!

Updates

2/15/18 - Bug Fixes
